DOC.brief_summary: A preliminary study to determine the possibility of using far infrared (FIR) radiation to treat impotency.
DOC.brief_title: Energy Specific Far Infrared Radiation Treatment for Erectile Dysfunction
DOC.detailed_description: Erectile dysfunction is characterized by the regular or repeated inability to obtain or maintain an erection. Erection depends on a complex interaction of psychological, neural, vascular and endocrine factors. We are proposing a non-drug and a non-invasive radiation treatment for the enhancement of erection.
